Instance Property# isVendorAccessory

iOS 26.1+iPadOS 26.1+Mac Catalyst 26.1+tvOS 26.1+visionOS 26.1+watchOS 26.1+

```
var isVendorAccessory: Bool { get }
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/HomeKit/HMAccessory/isVendorAccessory#discussion)

Returns YES if the current process is entitled to vendor-level access to this accessory.
